title: I need alot of help.
body: So today I was having trouble getting patch 7.12, I looked online but none of the solutions worked for me. So I deleted the game and then reinstalled it. Now I am having a completely new problem. I am on the old client screen where it says "THE CLIENT UPDATE HAS BEGUN" and at the top it says launch. Whenever I press launch I get a bugsplat window. Please help I just want to play some {{champion:27}} .

replies.body:
Unless severe modifications were made to your game files, your settings might be denying your game files permission to be used.  As a first step, run through every step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to ensure that access is being allowed.  

Once completed, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall, which will clear up any bad files.  That should get you ready for the client update!
